highlights.text: Star Seller. This seller consistently earned 5-star reviews, shipped on time & replied to any messages they received.
Priority is given to delivery after payment.

reviews.name: Maria
reviews.text: The customer service provided was exceptional. They were responsive to my inquiries and went above and beyond to ensure my satisfaction. The product itself is of great quality and was delivered promptly. I highly recommend both the product and the company.

reviews.name: Fatima
reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the attention to detail in the packaging of this product. It arrived in secure packaging, protecting it from any potential damage during transit. The product itself is exactly as described, and I couldn't be happier with my purchase.

reviews.name: Sara
reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this product. The quality is exceptional, the delivery service was fast, and the product was exactly as described. I highly recommend buying this product.

reviews.name: Amina
reviews.text: This product exceeded my expectations in terms of quality. The delivery service was reliable and the item arrived in pristine condition. It's exactly as described, and I highly recommend purchasing this product.

reviews.name: Sara
reviews.text: I'm blown away by the fast delivery and the quality of the product. Highly recommend it!

description:
Size chart:

Don't wait on this style... wide leg denim is BACK and a hot seller lately! These jeans feature the insane stretch that we all love, a flattering wide leg, cropped ankle length, and an amazing booty lifting design! These pair well with a cute pair of boots or your favorite sandals.

These Cropped Wide-Leg Patch Pocket Jeans have AMAZING stretch!!! Crafted from our premium and comfortable stretch denim, these jeans are stretchy from the waist all the way down! They will fit well whether you have muscular thighs or a more straight figure.. these flatter ALL body shapes!

The crop fit is SO ON TREND but what we really love about it is that it looks good on EVERYONE!! YOu can be tall, short, curvy or straight and it looks amazing! They will hug your curves in ALL the right ways.. your booty has never looked so good! They create a visually appealing silhouette, making your booty appear more lifted and perky, and doesn't hang out! Also the regular inseam lets you show off your shoe game.Plus, we added functional INSERTED patch front pockets for the very first time. Finished with 1970's inspired front and back pockets, high-rise coverage and released hems, these are sure to be your new favorites! They offer both style and functionality.Brighten up your spring and summer wardrobe with these Cropped Wide-Leg Patch Pocket Jeans. They will ensure all-day comfort without compromising on style. Features:

  • Comfortable stretch denim
  • Booty lifting
  • 10 - 11 inch approximate wide leg opening
  • Functional patch front and back pockets
  • Hits at natural waist for great coverage
  • Zipper closure for convenience

Care:

  • Machine Wash Warm, Gentle Cycle.
  • Only Non-Chlorine Bleach When Needed.
  • Tumble Dry Low.
  • Low Iron If Needed, Or Dry Clean.
